description.value:
School transmutation; Level cleric/oracle 6, sorcerer/wizard 7, summoner 6, unchained Summoner 6;

Casting Time 1 standard action
Components V, S

Range close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)
Targets one creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
Duration 1 hour/level
Saving Throw Will negates (harmless); Spell Resistance yes

Description

This spell functions as planetary adaptation, except as noted above.

target.value: one creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
